 class hexCell
          specialized cell used for the game hex, not for all games using a hex board.

Uses of cell in online.game
 

Subclasses of cell in online.game
 class ccell
          some legacy or simple games use just a "char" to indicate the contents of the cell.
 class chipCell
          this is the principal subclass of cell for cells whose contents is just a single object.
 class stackCell
          stackCell extends cell with a stack of chips.
 

Fields in online.game declared as cell
 cell[] cell.adjacent
          the adjacent cells.
 cell gBoard.allCells
           
 cell cell.next
          all the cells on the board are linked through the "next" field, so it's possible to traverse all the cells on the board (in no particular order) by starting at the board "allCells" and following the "next" links.

 cell cell.exitToward(int dir)
          this is the convenient way to traverse a row, column, or diagonal we expect the directions to be 0-n, but for convenient we accept anything modulo the geometry of the cell use gBoard.findDirectrion to convert coordinates to these directions
